edu.nps.moves.gateway

Class DisNative

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nps.moves.gateway.DisNative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DISEndpoint, java.lang.Runnable

    public class DisNative
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, DISEndpoint
    Reads and writes DIS from a native socket on the local network. This implements the DISEndpoint interface, which allows it to interoperate with the ConnectionManager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisNative

        public DisNative(java.net.MulticastSocket socket,
                 java.net.InetAddress multicastAddress,
                 int port)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        socket - socket we read and write on. You should create this socket with the DisSocketFactory object
        multicastAddress - If null we read and write bcast. Otherwise mcast on this address
        port - socket port

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Entry point for thread. Endlessly loop, reading UDP DIS packets.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • sendToClient

        public void sendToClient(java.lang.String aMessage)
        Sending strings to the local network is probably a bad idea. For now we simply no-op this because it doesn't make sense to send a non-standard string to the network.
        Specified by:
        sendToClient in interface DISEndpoint
        Parameters:
        aMessage - the string format message

      • sendBinaryToClient

        public void sendBinaryToClient(byte[] buf)
        Send native DIS to the local native network. Typically we receive DIS from some web page, and send it to the local network.
        Specified by:
        sendBinaryToClient in interface DISEndpoint
        Parameters:
        buf - DIS data

      • getMessagesSentSummaryStatistics

        public java.util.IntSummaryStatistics getMessagesSentSummaryStatistics()
        Get the summary statistics object for this connection for the number of messages (binary and json) sent. IntSummaryStatistics is a JDK8 class.
        Specified by:
        getMessagesSentSummaryStatistics in interface DISEndpoint
        Returns:
        IntSummaryStatistics summary stats for messages sent

      • getMessagesReceivedSummaryStatistics

        public java.util.IntSummaryStatistics getMessagesReceivedSummaryStatistics()
        Get the summary statistics object for this connection for the number of binary messages (binary and json) received. IntSummaryStatistics is a JDK8 class.
        Specified by:
        getMessagesReceivedSummaryStatistics in interface DISEndpoint
        Returns:
        IntSummaryStatistics summary stats for messages sent
